faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: How can we help you?
faq.question_1: How can I book a service on TicDrive?
faq.answer_1: Open the TicDrive app or website, enter your vehicle details and location, then select the type of service and time slot. Booking is quick and easy.
faq.question_2: How can I add or update a payment method?
faq.answer_2: Go to your profile and tap 'Payment methods' to add or update your preferred option.
faq.question_3: Can I book a service during the weekend?
faq.answer_3: Yes, you can schedule services any day of the week, including weekends.
faq.question_4: Can I cancel or modify a booking?
faq.answer_4: Yes, bookings can be canceled or modified at least 24 hours before the scheduled time.
